alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 6:55PM CDT until October 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OSAGE...NORTHEASTERN CREEK AND SOUTHERN TULSA COUNTIES... At 654 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Turley to 4 miles southeast of Sand Springs to 2 miles northeast of Sapulpa to 3 miles west of Mounds, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Sand Springs... Owasso... Bixby... Sapulpa... Jenks... Glenpool... Kiefer... Mounds... Jenks Riverside Airport... Turley... Tulsa International Airport... Liberty... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 206 and 230. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
